casebody.data:
WALKER
v.
KNATS CREEK NURSERY, INC. 39P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Russell F. Walker, for Walker, Russell F. Arthur M. Blue, Attorney at Law, Carthage, for Knats Creek Nursery, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2018 by Plaintiff for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
